blessings.description: Your entire Team's Rotation will become Maximalists Permanently.
blessings.title: Sky's The Limit

blessings.description: Whenever your Team is losing during the First Week of Next Season, they will have a chance of gaining Party Time Boosts.
blessings.title: Afterparty

blessings.description: Your Team will Overperform during Next Season's Midseason.
blessings.title: Middling

blessings.description: Your Cleanup Hitter (the 4th spot in your Lineup) will gain the High Pressure Mod for the following Season.
blessings.title: Clutch Up

blessings.description: Oh. Give your Team O Blood.
blessings.title: Absolute Zero

blessings.description: Stay Hydrated. Give your Team H2O Blood.
blessings.title: Water Logged

blessings.description: A Random Player on your Team will gain Affinity For Crows Permanently.
blessings.title: Bird Brain

blessings.description: Your Team's worst hitter will gain the Fourth Strike Permanently.
blessings.title: Mulligan

blessings.description: Your Team's Lineup and Rotation will have their Defense Boosted from 1% to 4%.
blessings.title: Defense Practice

blessings.description: Your Team's Lineup will have their Baserunning Boosted from 1% to 4%.
blessings.title: Running Practice

blessings.description: Your Team's Rotation will have their Pitching Boosted from 1% to 4%.
blessings.title: Pitching Practice

blessings.description: Your Team's Lineup will have their Hitting Boosted from 1% to 4%.
blessings.title: Batting Practice

blessings.description: Your Team's Shadows will have their Defense Boosted from 1% to 12%.
blessings.title: Shadow Defense Practice

blessings.description: Your Team's Shadows will have their Baserunning Boosted from 1% to 12%.
blessings.title: Shadow Running Practice

blessings.description: Your Team's Shadows will have their Pitching Boosted from 1% to 12%.
blessings.title: Shadow Pitching Practice

blessings.description: Your Team's Shadows will have their Hitting Boosted from 1% to 12%.
blessings.title: Shadow Batting Practice

blessings.description: Move the worst Hitter on your Team to the last spot in your Lineup.
blessings.title: Easy Out

blessings.description: Move the best Baserunner on your Team to the first position in your Lineup.
blessings.title: Lead Off

blessings.description: Recruit a Random Player with the Siphon Modification to your Team.
blessings.title: Blood Pact

blessings.description: Recruit a Random Player with the Perk Modification to your Team.
blessings.title: Fringe Benefit

blessings.description: A Random Player from your Team's Lineup will have their Divinity Boosted from -20% to 60%.
blessings.title: Epiphany

blessings.description: A Random Player from your Team's Lineup will have their Musclitude Boosted from -20% to 60%.
blessings.title: Dirty Bulk

blessings.description: A Random Player from your Team's Rotation will have their Overpowerment Boosted by 40%.
blessings.title: Living Single

blessings.description: A Random Player from your Team's Lineup will have their Ground Friction Boosted by 40%.
blessings.title: Triple Crown

decrees.description: Swing Away. Go on the offensive while providing a Global Hitting Boost.
decrees.title: Bats

decrees.description: Don't Lose Your Heads. Keep your wits about you while providing a global Pitching Boost.
decrees.title: Caps

decrees.description: Flight or Flight. Run away while providing global Baserunning Boost.
decrees.title: Shoes

decrees.description: Catch and Release. Keep threats in front of you while providing a global Defense Boost.
decrees.title: Gloves

wills.description: Steal a Player from the Idols board. Send a random Player from your Team back.

info.description: Which Idol do you want to steal?

wills.title: Plunder

wills.description: Swap a Player from a Team in the opposite Subleague with a Player from your Team. They must be within 2 combined stars of each other.

info.description: Which team do you want to swap with?
What player do you want to swap for?
What player do you want to send back?

wills.title: Equivalent Exchange

wills.description: Swap a Player from your Shadows to your active roster.

info.description: What player from the Shadows do you want to call up to the active roster?
What player from your active roster do you want to send to the Shadows?

wills.title: Foreshadow

wills.description: Move a Player on your Team to the desired location on your Roster.

info.description: Which Player would you like to move?
Which location do you want to move them?

wills.title: Move

wills.description: Boost a Player on your Team by 15% to 30% in a Stat Category of your choice, but Impair them in a Random other Category.

info.description: Which player do you want to Boost?
Which stat category do you want to Boost?

wills.title: Transfuse

wills.description: Call in an Alternate for a Player on your Team, with a mystery Benefit.

info.description: Which player do you want to call an Alternate Trust for?

wills.title: Alternate Trust

wills.description: Re-roll an eligible Permanent Modification for a Player on your Team.

info.description: Which player do you want to Reform?
Which mod would you like to Re-roll?

wills.title: Reform

wills.description: Pick a modification for your Team next season.
wills.title: Enrich
